Room.Name: Weather Wizard's Climate Control Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a room filled with weather maps and charts.
Room.LongDescription: A transparent globe floats in the center of the room, with a miniature landscape of the country surrounding The Tower Castle of Prince Rutger inside it. There are dials and controls under the globe, and several are marked with such words as Rain, Storm, Wind, and Lightning. A stack of black wands are arranged near the door.
